detaileddescription.para: This enum define the logger output level

briefdescription.para: Add Timestamp (epoch) to the log output.
Add Timestamp (epoch) plus millisecond to the log output.

detaileddescription.para: This enum define the Timestamp added to the log output

briefdescription.para: This global variable define the output logger level.
This file declare available Logger functions.
